data.title: Never again
data.text: Everything is set portions because the mangers cost determines their incentive pay. More cost = less pay for the managers, and it shows. Cheese is delivered frozen, and thawed. The dough is made daily, but may be kept over night until lunch. You can tell. Cheese costs are a big item, and it's skimpy. They ding you for any items, and they market unhealthy things like hotdog pizza. Nothing authentic about it.
